markdown:
<title level="1" right="Rules">[Complex Hazards](/Rules.aspx?ID=685)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 526 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Complex hazards function similarly to monsters during encounters, as they roll initiative and have actions of their own, though these are usually automated in a routine.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Complex Hazards
